sentences: Representatives from the IPCC, Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD), Food and Agriculture Organization, and UN Forum on Forests reported on their respective activities related to the UNFCCC process.
SWITZERLAND suggested strengthening the role of the Joint Liaison Group of the CBD, UNFCCC and UN Convention to Combat Desertification.
The US said cooperation should be on national and local levels.
A contact group, co-chaired by Outi Berghäll (Finland) and Marcela Main (Chile) will address the issue.
enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
